column2: You have a great interest in numbers, and you demonstrate a notable preference for jobs that involve handling figures, it would be recommended that you study one of the following professions: Accounting, economics, mathematics teacher, administration, electronic engineering and systems engineering

Your interest is basically focused on investigating the reason for the events. You love to observe physical, biological and cultural phenomena with the purpose of understanding them and subsequently controlling them. It is recommended to study the professions: Chemical engineering, anthropology, human medicine, sociology, nursing, social sciences teacher, food industry engineering and agroindustrial engineering.

You have an interest in handling real, tangible things, such as tools, machines, vehicles, and animals. Therefore, it is recommended that you study one of these professions: Civil engineering, Electrical engineering, Mechanical engineering, Metallurgical engineering, Mechanical engineering, mining engineering.

Interest in guiding, educating or guiding people. He also has an altruistic and humanitarian disposition, and is concerned with remedying the needs of his neighbor. If this is your case, we recommend that you study the following professions: Psychology, social work, education, hospitality and tourism, law, religious vocation.

Great interest in communication, you consider language as an important means of expression. They like to read and express their ideas orally or in writing. It is recommended that you study any of the following careers: Language and literature teacher, communication sciences.

Organize people or groups of people, to later obtain a benefit, they like to deal with people, present their points of view and influence the opinions of others. It is recommended to study the following professions: Administration, sociology, social work, or choose to apply to one of the armed institutes (Army, Navy and Aviation) or the National Police.

You are creative, you have a preference for tasks that involve the development of artistic expression using combinations of colors, materials, shapes, designs. It is recommended to study one of these careers: Architecture, interior decoration, drawing, graphic design, advertising design, advertising, plastic arts, photography.

You have great interest in office work. You like to work with written or numerical data, organized according to a system, which can be accounting, legal, economic, etc. If this is your case, it is recommended that you study the professions of: Accounting, economics and secretarial work

Interest in defending people's rights, you seek justice and equity, you have critical thinking about social problems and debates with others to reach a solution, you seek to obtain knowledge about the laws and norms that govern a society. Law and political science
